** This version is called old because when training using TNG and applying on SIMBA maps and vice versa, I had forgot to normalize the data using the dataset on which it was trained on. **
--------------------
Notes:
1. In all cases, the accuracies are reported on the entire test set. But the CKA is computed only for 16 maps.
--------------------
